page.title: 06Churches In Stanhope
page.content: There are two churches in Stanhope. One is a Methodist Church and one Church of England.At the Chapel there are 2 services every Sunday.On average 20 people come.The money which is raised is used for paying the Ministers and Missionaries.They also have money raising events such as coffee mornings etc.There are about 6 weddings,about 12 funerals and 6 baptisms each year. The Chapel holds 500 people in a large service.The Church holds 3 services each Sunday.On average 50 people come. The money that is raised goes to paying the Rectors, Bishops and Missionaries etc.They also have money raising events like Garden Fetes that raise about Â£1000.There are about 12_13 funerals and 5_6 baptisms and 6_7 weddings each year.The Church holds 300 people.
